articles.title: Niagara Falls to be lit up in white tonight to honour Betty White's 100th birthday - CBC.ca
articles.description: The Horseshoe and American falls will be lit up white Monday night to honour what would have been iconic actor Betty White’s 100th birthday.
articles.content:
For 15 minutes on Monday night, Niagara Falls will pay tribute to legendary actor Betty White by lighting up both the Canadian and American waterfalls  in white, of course.

articles.title: Celine Dion cancels North American tour over ongoing health concerns - ABC News
articles.description: After an extended pause, Celine Dion is forced to cancel the North American leg of her world tour over a longer-than-expected recovery from muscle spasms.
articles.content:
Canadian superstar Celine Dion has announced she will not be able to perform the North America leg of her "Courage World Tour" due to persistent health problems.
